text: Great Migration, Great Migrations, or The Great Migration may refer to: ==Historical events== * The Migration Period of Europe from 400 to 800 AD * Great Migration, resulting from the 1947 Partition of British India * African American "Great Migrations": ** The original Great Migration (African American) from the southern United States to the northern United States (1910â€“1930) ==Nature== * Great migration, a yearly wildebeest migration in the Serengeti ==Related pages== *Forced migration *Human migration *Great American Interchange
title: Great Migration
